game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the captured princess from the castle
game.description: You are required to infiltrate the enemy's castle and rescue the princess who has been held captive. You will encounter various challenges along the way which you must overcome. Be on the lookout for secret passages inside the castle. Good luck!
game.reward: The Kingdom's Gratitude and a Royal Sword

task.objective: Gather information about the enemy's castle
task.description: Talk to the villagers and collect as much information as you can about the enemy's castle such as the guard's rotation time, secret passages etc.
Use the information gathered to infiltrate the enemy's castle. Avoid direct confrontation as much as you can. Find the princess' cell.
Once you find the princess, lead her out of the castle carefully. Reach the castle's main gate to complete the task.
